sentence: He invented a special pair of shoes which allowed people to walk on water.
sentence_trans: 他发明了一双特殊的鞋子，人们可以穿着它在水上行走。

sentence: He's a wise person who has some great inventions.
sentence_trans: 睿智的他有很多杰出的发明。

sentence: Thanks to the inventor of the telephone, we can talk anytime anywhere.
sentence_trans: 多亏了电话的发明者，我们才能随时随地地聊天。
